alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Okeechobee; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 6:47AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Has Developed Across Portions of Osceola, Okeechobee and Indian River Counties... Satellite imagery and traffic cameras indicate that areas of low clouds and fog have formed across southern Osceola, Okeechobee and Indian River counties. Localized visibilities less than a half mile will be possible in these areas. If you will be driving in these counties, especially along Florida`s Turnpike and I-95, prepare for rapidly changing visibility due to locally dense fog. Reduce your speed, use your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you. The fog is expected to persist through around 8 to 9 AM, and then should quickly diminish into mid morning.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Okeechobee; Osceola
